titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the speedy payment of the monies assessed by Parliament for disbanding the armies
Proclamations. 1641-07-06.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and by the assigns of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Given at His Majesties palace at westminster the sixt day of July, in the seventeenth yeer of the reign of our Soveraign Lord Charles by the grace of God King of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c. God save the King.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Majesty: and
